channel.title: Help me and become an admin on my server
channel.description: i need to know how to open my testscape the server i used to have didnt have "client" so i got testscape to make my server and i need to know how to use it, its says starting testscape server on... and my port when i click on runserver. what do i do?

item.title: Help me and become an admin on my server
item.dc:creator: @Ricksta18 Ricksta18
item.description:
@Ricksta18 wrote:

open client.java, search for " //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin"
right under it, add “if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kramer4life”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}”
cause it says 3 u look up the top and see that 3 = admin :), if u need more help pm me,

Read full topic
item.source: Help me and become an admin on my server
